Maine Forensic Economics & Business Valuation Expert

Court-qualified economic expert witness serving all Maine courts and jurisdictions. From Portland's federal courthouse to county seats in Augusta, Bangor, and beyond, we provide comprehensive economic damage analysis throughout the Pine Tree State.

Call: (203) 605-2814
Email: chris@skerritteconomics.com
Available: All Maine Courts

Expert Witness Services for Maine Litigation

Comprehensive economic analysis and expert testimony for law firms throughout Maine. Our experts use proven methodology with understanding of Maine's economic landscape.
